name: Bubblegum Planet (TweetTweetJam)
description:
Go East as far as you can.  A game in 560 characters for TweetTweetJam#2

Features:

  • sound and music, sort of.
  • pixel perfect collisions *
  • freely explorable planet as long as you don't go left.
  • 3 types of annoying aliens

*for certain pixels

Jam page and pico-8 source code:
https://itch.io/jam/tweettweetjam-2/rate/424963
